author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Was hoping to update #3645 by calling `@JuliaRegistrator register()` but the result is this new PR, which includes the suggested `compat` change in `Project.toml`
If you put the version back to what it was then it will update that PR instead of creating a new one.

body:
